Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Automic ETL - AI-Augmented Data Lakehouse Platform

Features:
- Medallion architecture (Bronze/Silver/Gold layers) with Delta Lake
- LLM-augmented ETL capabilities (schema inference, entity extraction, NL queries)
- Multiple connectors: databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, Snowflake, BigQuery, MongoDB),
  APIs (Salesforce, HubSpot, Stripe, REST), files (CSV, JSON, Parquet), unstructured (PDF)
- Cloud storage support: AWS S3, GCS, Azure Blob
- SCD Type 2 slowly changing dimensions support
- Data validation and quality framework
- Lineage tracking and visualization
- Job orchestration and scheduling
- Notification system (email, Slack, webhook, PagerDuty)
- Authentication with RBAC and superadmin support
- Streamlit UI with theming, components, and dashboard widgets
